clips.title: following_mido
clips.description: Opening flash-forward where Oh Dae-Su silently follows Mi-do, foreshadowing distrust and mystery.

clips.title: tv_attempted_suicide
clips.description: A montage of television clips reveals Dae-Su's descent into desperation — climaxing in a failed suicide attempt.

clips.title: police_station_arrest
clips.description: Drunken Oh Dae-Su is arrested at a police station — disoriented and chaotic introduction to his character.

clips.title: tooth_pull_vengeance
clips.description: Dae-su enacts revenge by pulling out a man's teeth without anesthesia — brutality executed with unnerving calm. The scene echoes his transformation into an agent of vengeance.

clips.title: scenic_taxi_drive
clips.description: On the way to his final confrontation, the drive plays like a requiem - purpose swells, but at what cost?

clips.title: penthouse_entry_sequence
clips.description: Dae-su enters the penthouse for the final reveal - every step heavy with dread and inevitability.

clips.title: phonebooth_confrontation
clips.description: A tense exchange in a phone booth where Dae-Su realizes his predator may always be one step ahead.

clips.title: cutting_out_tongue
clips.description: Oh Dae-Su offers his own tongue in penance, a symbolic gesture begging for mercy — justice reimagined as self-mutilation.

clips.title: tooth_extraction_torture
clips.description: A chilling torture scene where Dae-Su forcefully pulls out a man’s teeth — punishment without courtroom, revenge masquerading as righteousness.

clips.title: cryptic_call
clips.description: Dae-su receives a cryptic call that reawakens the psychological torment he's been enduring - truth dangled as control.

clips.title: meeting_wu_jin
clips.description: Oh Dae-Su meets his captor face to face for the first time, a moment of poised power imbalance and unspoken understanding.

clips.title: post_hypnosis_confusion
clips.description: Dae-Su wakes up after a hypnosis session, dazed and altered — a blurred boundary between free will and manipulation.

clips.title: dae_su_briefcase
clips.description: A moment of pause that raises questions about power, payoff, and what justice truly costs.

clips.title: mido_music_bonding
clips.description: In a rare quiet moment, Dae-Su and Mi-do bond over music — an oasis of normalcy that feels borrowed from another life.

clips.title: suitcase_release
clips.description: Dae-Su’s sudden release in a suitcase — a symbolic rebirth into a world that feels just as claustrophobic as the cell.

clips.title: dream_with_mido
clips.description: A surreal sequence in which Dae-Su dreams of Mi-do — tender, strange, and charged with the ambiguity of truth.

clips.title: police_station_comedy
clips.description: Early sequence showcasing Dae-Su’s drunken antics at the police station.

clips.title: captive_fight_dream
clips.description: A stylized hallucination in which Dae-su imagines fighting off captors while in solitary confinement. Reflects his growing mental instability.

clips.title: police_station_alt
clips.description: An alternate segment in the police station, continuing Dae-su’s chaotic, drunken behavior.

clips.title: mido_caretaking_dae_su
clips.description: A quiet, tender sequence that deepens the ambiguity between maternal instinct, romantic intimacy, and narrative manipulation.

clips.title: maniac_elevator_laughing
clips.description: Dae-su laughs manically in the elevator after a brutal fight — an unsettling expression of catharsis, madness, and bitter triumph.

clips.title: classroom_hallway_walk
clips.description: Dae-su walks the hauntingly empty hallway of a school — a spatial and psychological return to the origin of his trauma. Memory and architecture collapse into each other.
